text: o blizhayshey i posledney zhizni! I sprashivayut oni tebya o sirotakh. Skazhi: "Soversheniye blagogo im - khorosho". A yesli smeshayetes' s nimi, to oni - vashi brat'ya; Allakh raspoznayet tvoryashchego nechestiye ot tvoryashchego blago. A yesli by zakhotel Allakh, On by vas utomil. Poistine, Allakh - velikiy, mudryy
